sentences.en: Don't pester me with your trivial matters.
sentences.cn: 别拿你那些鸡毛蒜皮的事同我纠缠.

sentences.en: Don't pester me. I've got something urgent to attend to.
sentences.cn: 你别跟我蘑菇了, 我还有急事呢.

sentences.en: For years Mary have been pester him to take her to europe.
sentences.cn: 玛丽多年来一直缠著他要他带她去欧洲玩.

sentences.en: He told her not to pester him with trifles.
sentences.cn: 他对她说不要为小事而烦扰他.

sentences.en: I beg you too, don't pester me about watching something I have no interest in!
sentences.cn: 就算我也求求你, 别再缠着我逼我去看我根本没兴趣的东西!

sentences.en: If someone says you killed a person thin airly, can you pester an explanation with him?
sentences.cn: 假如有人无中生有地说你杀了人, 你会跟他纠缠解释 吗 ?

sentences.en: It is painful to acknowledge, but marketers were right all along : pester power works.
sentences.cn: 要承认这一点很痛苦, 但市场营销商们的理念一直正确——孩子一哭闹,父母就买单.

sentences.en: Lunch was the worst. Seven of my friends could pester me at once.
sentences.cn: 午饭的时候最糟, 我的七个朋友一直不依不饶地追问我.

sentences.en: Not pester me tell you, you are still there in front of our eyes.
sentences.cn: 告诉你别缠着我, 你却还出现在我的眼前. 怎么说来着?

sentences.en: Now with Joy for company, she didn't pester him so much and he came home later.
sentences.cn: 近来,有小福子做伴儿, 她不甚管束他了,他就晚回来一些.

sentences.en: Oh, let them alone. Don't pester them.
sentences.cn: 哦, 让他们请便罢, 千万不要打扰他们.

sentences.en: PLAYER, how long will you pester me with indecisive ways?
sentences.cn: 你到底要为这些细枝末节纠缠我多久?

sentences.en: She tried to shake him off but he continued to pester her.
sentences.cn: 她想甩开他,但他仍不断缠着她.

sentences.en: She’d been pestered by reporters for days.
sentences.cn: 几天来她一直受到记者们的纠缠。

trans.tran_en: to annoy someone, especially by asking them many times to do something
